body: Yes, the latter (compiler checks for swap idiom). I know that we generally eschew these kinds of optimizations (in favor of more general optimizations), but it may be easy enough (not sure though) and perhaps the win is high (sorting is reasonably important). Or in other words: I'm advocating it's worthwhile an experiment for somebody who wants to play with it. The outcome of that experiment may inform us about whether it's worthwhile or not keeping the optimization.
